backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing show and schedule management with user profiles, authorization via mixins, and CRUD operations for shows and schedules with admin-only write access.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining type definitions for Show, Schedule, UserProfile, and Actor state with a passthrough migration function.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the "create a new show entry" feature with high confidence, linking to test REQ-4 and multiple components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration for the Country Channel radio website.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system for light and dark themes, defining design tokens for the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Country Channel Website with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component managing authentication state, profile setup modal, admin dashboard toggle, and rendering Header, Footer, HomePage or AdminDashboard.
frontend/src/components/admin/AddSchedul: Dialog form for creating new show schedules with day of week, start/end time selection (hour/minute dropdowns), and validation. Converts times to BigInt format (HHMM) before submission.
frontend/src/components/admin/AddShowDia: Dialog form for adding new shows with ID, title, description, and image upload. Converts uploaded image files to ExternalBlob with upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/admin/EditSchedu: Dialog form for editing existing schedules, pre-populating fields from the schedule prop. Converts BigInt time values to/from hour and minute components for display and submission.
frontend/src/components/admin/EditShowDi: Dialog form for editing show details (title, description, optional image replacement). Reuses existing image blob if no new file is uploaded, with progress tracking for new uploads.
frontend/src/components/admin/ScheduleMa: Displays schedules organized by day of week in a grid layout with edit/delete actions. Includes confirmation dialog for deletions and formats BigInt times to 12-hour AM/PM display.
frontend/src/components/admin/ShowManage: Displays a grid of show cards with edit and delete actions, using dialogs for editing and confirmation. Handles show deletion via mutation and displays empty state when no shows exist.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright, caffeine.ai attribution link, and Country Channel tagline.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with channel logo, login/logout button, and admin dashboard toggle for authorized users.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog requiring first-time users to enter their name before accessing the application, with form validation and submission.
frontend/src/components/RadioBanner.tsx: Scrolling marquee banner with amber gradient background displaying links to Live365 and GetMeRadio streaming platforms.
frontend/src/components/ScheduleView.tsx: Weekly schedule grid component displaying shows organized by day of week with formatted time ranges and show titles.
frontend/src/components/ShowCard.tsx: Displays a show card with image, title, and description. Uses ExternalBlob's getDirectURL() to fetch and display show images with a fallback placeholder.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance with authentication, creating actors based on Internet Identity state and initializing access control with admin token. Invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient configuration with delegation origin support.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, shows, and schedules with CRUD operations. Each mutation automatically invalidates relevant query caches.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme colors using OKLCH color space, plus a marquee animation utility.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page with tabs for managing shows and schedules, displaying management components and dialogs for adding new shows/schedules.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main homepage component that displays a hero banner, live radio player, recently played tracks, and tabbed sections for shows and schedules using custom hooks to fetch data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters and session storage, supporting both standard query strings and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, and custom animations including accordion and marquee effects.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file containing pending feature requests to add weekend and morning show schedules, along with existing features and architectural notes.
